name: Snaphost_HKLM_appcompatflags_custom
pattern: {"query": "select name,type,data from registry where key='HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\software\\microsoft\\windows nt\\currentversion\\appcompatflags\\custom';", "interval": 28800, "description": "**Application Shimming** Snapshot Returns the content of the key HKLM_Software_Microsoft_WindowsNT_CurrentVersion_appcompatflags_custom - ATT&CK T1138", "snapshot": true}
